NewsArticle.Title: New Area - Capture The Flag
NewsArticle.Content: Capture the Flag The "Capture the Flag" map is being released today after this afternoon's reset ~4PM. LOCATION: Suomi Village Please speak to Keane to gain access to the map. Games will be hosted by Suomi Troupes members. For more information contact Etna, Burgess of Suomi Troupe. CTF is still in Beta, some options may not available. Rules and features of the game may change at anytime. ((This area is for registered players only, no level restrictions.))
